def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(
        cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"]
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
c = Counter([input().split()[1] for _ in range(n)])
print(c['soft']*c['hard'])

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
c = Counter([input().split()[1] for _ in range(n)])
print(c['soft']*c['hard'])

def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = { "soft": 0, "hard": 0 }
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {"soft": 0, "hard": 0}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
